title: Starblood
description: In a seedy Goth club, a beautiful woman dances, waiting to be set free. Along an unlit street, another woman stumbles, fleeing her pursuer. In a darkened room, a man speaks to demons.Lust, obsession, terror and humiliation storm into the lives of Star and Satori, proving the age-old maxim â€“ be careful what you wish for.Starblood, the debut novel by Carmilla Voiez, is a tale of magic and horror.Blinded by love, Satori, a young magician, attempts a spell that goes horribly wrong, resulting in the demon Lilith returning to Earth. Satori knows he must send Lilith back. The dark goddess brimming with power makes it her mission to wreak havoc on Satori's life by ensnaring Star, the woman he loves, and her friends in a web of chaos and deceit.
author: Carmilla Voiez
